entry.title: Wednesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
